content.text: Let's put everything together! This lesson reviews all quadratic concepts and explores advanced applications in physics, economics, and engineering.

content.heading: Forms of Quadratics Summary
content.text:
• Standard form: f(x) = ax² + bx + c
• Factored form: f(x) = a(x - r₁)(x - r₂)
• Vertex form: f(x) = a(x - h)² + k

Each form reveals different information about the parabola!

content.heading: Projectile Motion
content.problem: A rocket's height is h(t) = -5t² + 30t + 10 meters. When does it reach 35m?
solution: t = 1 second (going up) and t = 5 seconds (coming down)

content.heading: Business Application
content.problem: Profit is P(x) = -2x² + 40x - 50 dollars, where x is hundreds of items. Find maximum profit.

content.heading: Comprehensive Practice
problems: For P(x) = -x² + 50x, at what x is profit maximized?
If projectile lands at t=4, initial velocity with h=-16t²+vt?
